---
title: "Aggregates in R"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r message = FALSE}
# load packages
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r message = FALSE}
# load order data
orders <- read_csv("orders.csv")

# inspect orders here:
head(orders, 10)
```

```{r}
# define most_expensive here:
most_expensive <- orders %>% summarize(most_expensive = max(price, na.rm = TRUE))
most_expensive
```

```{r}
# define num_colors here:
num_colors <- orders %>% summarize(dist_color = n_distinct(shoe_color))
num_colors
```
